channel.title: Is it easy to map music in ur oldschool server?
channel.description: Jw, is it easy to put music into areas in yourserver? Lumbridge=harmony etcetc.. is it? how? i want to learn i'm working on a rsremake. even though it won't go far becuase 2006scape/rs2006

item.title: Is it easy to map music in ur oldschool server?
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

It is possible, but it will require some skill; take that goal off your list and work on something else. I’ve seen a few servers with music all over the regions, I’ve actually saw many. Example, Emps-Scape, RuneEscape etc.

Read full topic
